name: Pink girl
description:
"Pink girl" is a creative puzzle game done with a special puzzle method.
Easy decompression is the purpose of the game, players only need to consider when to play, and do not care about other!
100 convenient and practical achievements!
The style is light and sophisticated, and it is a rare otaku game!

Game free DLC patch,Unlock 36 new pictures in the other three floors!
press the key combination "Win + R" Enter: steam://install/1180920, press Enter, you can download the free DLC.
